# Changelog

## 1.0.5 (2025-03-17)
* Address deprecated packages ([MGNLCLI-320](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-320))

## 1.0.4 (2025-01-21)
* move prettier from devDependencies to dependencies ([MGNLCLI-342](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-342))

## 1.0.3 (2025-01-20)
* configure eslint and prettier ([MGNLCLI-258](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-258))

## 1.0.2 (2025-01-07)
* support both ESM and CommonJS projects ([MGNLCLI-313](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-313))


## 1.0.1 (2024-10-24)

## 1.0.0 (2024-10-14)
